introduction: SYNOPSISMarriage life of Ma-ri, a translator and Hi-mok, an orchestra conductor seemed to be perfect. Hi-mok gets the wrong idea when he sees his wife meeting with the artist Jung Shin who lives in Germany. Ma-ri went out with him before they got married. Hi-mok abuses Ma-ri mentally. He continues his affair with Nam Kyung, a member of his orchestra. One day, Ma-ri's son, Yul, enters the little league of baseball. She falls for Suh Dong-hun, the coach. Hi-mok catches onto the affair and cross-exams his wife. Ma-ri is tormented by the love that must not be. Arrested for adultery, Ma-ri and Dong-hun reconfirm their love as they are led away in handcuffs.
